cast.overview: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.
cast.title: The Lobster

crew.overview: In a dystopian near future, single people, according to the laws of The City, are taken to The Hotel, where they are obliged to find a romantic partner in forty-five days or are transformed into animals and sent off into The Woods.
crew.title: The Lobster

details.biography: Jacqueline Abrahams is a British production designer known for her work on The Lobster (2015), Lady Macbeth (2016), His House (2020), and How I Live Now (2013). She won a BIFA Award for His House and a BAFTA for Wallander (2009). Trained in fine arts, she transitioned from set decoration to production design, creating authentic cinematic environments.
details.name: Jacqueline Abrahams
